title: Potential SQL Injection Vulnerability
description: User input is directly concatenated into SQL query without proper sanitization. This could allow SQL injection attacks.
codeSnippet:
String query = "SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = '" + username + "' AND password = '" + password + "'";
ResultSet rs = statement.executeQuery(query);

suggestedPatches.explanation: Replace string concatenation with parameterized queries using PreparedStatement to prevent SQL injection.
